name: Money Crab
description:
Will you help Money Crab get rich while not getting killed by sea wastes?   INTRODUCTION

Money Crab is actually my first ever completed game, but it is the second to get published. It is a simple game of evading falling hazards, while gaining score by catching falling coins. The game is incomplete at the moment, but I was eager to share it ahead of completion.

 

CONTROLS

- Left-Right Arrow Keys: move Money Crab left and right

 

UPDATE HISTORY & ROADMAP

- v 0.1 (current version): Extremely barebones game completed.

- v 0.2: Add effects when Money Crab gets hit by sea waste and when Money Crab collects a coin.

- v 0.3 and so on: TBD

 

CREDITS

- Developed by 2 Dong Galbi

- Base game, the Raining Apocalypse, tutorial by Blackthronprod

https://www.udemy.com/course/make-your-first-2d-game-with-unity-c-beginner-cours...

- [FONT] AEnigma Fonts for "Kirby No Kira Kizzu BRK" (used in v0.1)
